titles.title: Expressing support for designation of the week of September 18, 2017, through September 24, 2017, as "Balance Awareness Week".
Expressing support for designation of the week of September 18, 2017, through September 24, 2017, as "Balance Awareness Week".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: Expresses support for the designation of Balance Awareness Week and recognizes the importance of raising public awareness about vestibular (inner ear balance) disorders.
